text: Wang Yeping (, born February 12, 1928), is the widow of Jiang Zemin, former General Secretary of the Communist Party of China de facto paramount leader and President of the People's Republic of China (de jure head of state), and is a native of Yangzhou, Jiangsu. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:People from Jiangsu
title: Wang Yeping
